twoSetSkill.name: Fox Flame 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: For every Combo Hit Count, Higokumaru's attacks gain 1% Fire DMG. Stacks up to 40 times. Host also gains the same fire damage bonus.

threeSetSkill.name: Fox Shadow 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Upon entering the battle, if Combo Hit Count is less than 50, instantly increase the count to 50. CD: 30s. Fox Flame can gain 40 more stacks.
